sent.orig: It's an exzample of speech assimilation to pronounce"grandma" as "grammar".
sent.trans: 把“grandma”读成“grammar”是语音同化的一个例证。
把“grandma”读成“grammar”是语音同化的一个例证。

sent.orig: Grandma and Grandpa didn't bring Great-Grandma Porter with them.
sent.trans: 奶奶和爷爷没有带曾祖母波特和他们一块儿来。

sent.orig: Grandma is a kind person, very mild when talking to others.
sent.trans: 奶奶是个慈祥的人，跟人说话语气很婉和。

sent.orig: It's hard to imagine sticking Grandma in a centrifuge to protect her muscle mass.
sent.trans: 很难想象把老奶奶绑在离心机上保持肌肉会是什么情形。
